name: 261-4  misty fjord hood
notes:
**knitted hooded scarf in drops air. the piece is worked in garter stitch with i-cord. sizes s - xl.**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

#mistyfjordhood
drops design: pattern ai-538
yarn group c or a + a

-------------------------------------------------------


**sizes**:
s/m - l/xl
fits head-size: 54/56 - 58/60 cm
width: 204-212 cm.

**yarn**:
drops air from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group c)
200-200 g colour 30, sage green

**needles**:
drops circular needle size 4 mm: length 80 cm.

**knitting tension**:
19 stitches in width and 38 rows in height, with garter stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm.
note: needle size is only a guide. if you get too many stitches within 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. if you get too few stitches within 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
